data.reviewText: The main reason we use your information is to deliver and improve our services.

We may use the personal information we obtain to provide and enhance our Services , such as registering you or your device for a Service , identifying and authenticating you so you may use and interact with third - party services , and improving and customizing your experience within the Services .
We may use the personal information we obtain to communicate with you .
We may use the personal information we obtain to provide customer support .

We may use the personal information we obtain to operate , evaluate and improve our business , including developing new products and services , managing our communications , analyzing our Services and customer base , conducting market research , aggregating and anonymizing data , performing data analytics , and undertaking accounting , auditing and other internal functions .
We may use the personal information we obtain to protect against , identify and prevent fraud and other criminal activity , claims and other liabilities .

We may use the personal information we obtain to comply with and enforce applicable legal requirements , relevant industry standards and our policies , including this Privacy Policy and the applicable Terms of Use for a Service .
We may combine information we obtain about you for the purposes described above .
We also may use the information we obtain in other ways for which we provide specific notice at the time of collection or otherwise with your consent .
We may use the information we obtain through the Voice Service to provide you with the Services , such as to respond to your requests , questions and instructions made through the Voice Service .
We may use the information we obtain through the Voice Service to identify and authenticate you so you may use certain Voice Service .

We may use the information we obtain through the Voice Service to improve and customize your experience with the Voice Service , such as delivering content and responses tailored to our users and the manner in which they interact with the Voice Service .

With your separate consent , we may use the information we obtain through the Voice Service to communicate with you about our products and services , and provide you with notifications , content , alerts , offers , promotions , marketing information , communications and advertisements .
We may use the information we obtain through the Voice Service to respond to your requests and inquiries .

We may use the information we obtain through the Voice Service to operate , evaluate and improve our business ( including developing new products ; enhancing and improving our products and the services ; managing our communications ; analyzing our products , customer base and the services ; conducting market research ; performing data analytics ; and performing accounting , auditing and other internal functions ) .
We may use the information we obtain through the Voice Service to allow you to interact with and use certain third - party apps and services .
We may use the information we obtain through the Voice Service to protect against , identify and prevent fraud and other criminal activity , claims and other liabilities .

We may use the information we obtain through the Voice Service to comply with and enforce applicable legal requirements , relevant industry standards and our policies , including this Privacy Notice , the Samsung Account Privacy Policy .
We may use the information we obtain through the IBA Service to provide you with the IBA Service on your Smart TV and across your devices .
We may use the information we obtain through the IBA Service to improve and customize your experience with the IBA Service .

With your separate consent , we may use the information we obtain through the IBA Service to communicate with you via email and push notification about products and services offered by Samsung and third parties that are tailored to your interests .
We may use the information we obtain through the IBA Service to respond to your requests and enquiries .

We may use the information we obtain through the IBA Service to operate , evaluate , and improve our business ( including developing new products ; enhancing and improving our products and the services ; managing our communications ; analyzing our products , customer base and services ; conducting market research ; performing data analytics ; and performing accounting , auditing and other internal functions ) .
We may use the information we obtain through the IBA Service to protect against , identify , and prevent fraud and other criminal activity , claims , and other liabilities .

We may use the information we obtain through the IBA Service to comply with and enforce applicable legal requirements , relevant industry standards , and our policies , including this Privacy Notice and the Samsung Privacy Policy .
We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To deliver and provide our Products and Service , including our voice recognition services .
We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To establish and manage your account .
We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To identify you and allow you to access the Service or limited - entry areas of the Service .
We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To complete a transaction or service requested by you .
We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To provide you with a user - friendly navigation experience .

We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To alert you of special offers , updated information , other new products or services , or to send other promotional materials to you .

We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To help ensure the Service is relevant to your needs , customize your experience with the Service , and help us create and publish content most relevant to you .
We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To facilitate services offered by third parties , such as the Amazon Dash Replacement Service .

We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To operate , evaluate and improve our business ( including developing new products and services ; enhancing and improving our Products and Service ; analyzing and reviewing our user base and Products and Service , performing data analytics and market research , and performing accounting , auditing and other internal functions ) .
We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : For internal record keeping purposes .

We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : For customer service purposes , such as to provide you with prompt consultation and repair services , preventative diagnostic and maintenance services including in - app maintenance alerts , and to provide you with information about replacement of spare parts , including links to purchase specific spare parts based on your needs .

We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To provide energy consumption management services if you agree to participate in the demand response service .

We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To respond to your comments and inquiries , such as when you use the “ Contact Us ” feature , upload a picture of your device , or submit an inquiry through other channels .

We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To communicate with you about changes to our Privacy Policy or the Terms of Use of the Service , if necessary .

We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To protect against , identify and prevent fraud and other criminal activity , claims and other liabilities .

We use your information that is collected through the Service primarily for the following purposes : To comply with applicable legal requirements and protect and defend our rights and property , including by way of legal proceedings and to comply with regulatory requirements and company policies .

We may also combine information obtained from your Services , including personal information , with information that you provide to us by other means , for the purposes consistent with this Privacy Policy .

We also may receive your information , including your email , from third - party social networking services ( e.g. Google , Facebook ) when you choose to connect our Services with those social networking services .

We use the information we have to deliver our Products , including to personalize features and content ( including your News Feed , Instagram Feed , Instagram Stories and ads ) and make suggestions for you ( such as groups or events you may be interested in or topics you may want to follow ) on and off our Products .

To create personalized Products that are unique and relevant to you , we use your connections , preferences , interests and activities based on the data we collect and learn from you and others ( including any data with special protections you choose to provide ) ; how you use and interact with our Products ; and the people , places , or things you 're connected to and interested in on and off our Products .
We connect information about your activities on different Facebook Products and devices to provide a more tailored and consistent experience on all Facebook Products you use , wherever you use them .

We use location - related information - such as your current location , where you live , the places you like to go , and the businesses and people you 're near - to provide , personalize and improve our Products , including ads , for you and others .
We use the information we have to develop , test and improve our Products , including by conducting surveys and research , and testing and troubleshooting new products and features .
If you have it turned on , we use face recognition technology to recognize you in photos , videos and camera experiences .
We use the information we have about you - including information about your interests , actions and connections - to select and personalize ads , offers and other sponsored content that we show you .

We use the information we have ( including your activity off our Products , such as the websites you visit and ads you see ) to help advertisers and other partners measure the effectiveness and distribution of their ads and services , and understand the types of people who use their services and how people interact with their websites , apps , and services .

We use the information we have to verify accounts and activity , combat harmful conduct , detect and prevent spam and other bad experiences , maintain the integrity of our Products , and promote safety and security on and off of Facebook Products .
For example , we use data we have to investigate suspicious activity or violations of our terms or policies , or to detect when someone needs help .
We use the information we have to send you marketing communications , communicate with you about our Products , and let you know about our policies and terms .
We also use your information to respond to you when you contact us .

We use the information we have ( including from research partners we collaborate with ) to conduct and support research and innovation on topics of general social welfare , technological advancement , public interest , health and well - being .
For example , we analyze information we have about migration patterns during crises to aid relief efforts .
